title: Drawing, Design for Sideboard with Serpentine Front in Elevation and Partial Plan, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Sideboard with Serpentine Front in Elevation and Partial Plan
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper center of elevation: Mirror [?]; across bottom of plan: Mhg [for "mahogany"?][inverted "V"]=[inverted "U"]; in center of plan, numerical notations indicating dimensions
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description:
Partial elevation: oblong sideboard with 4 straight tapering legs [2 shown]; tri-partite front has 2 drawers center, the top one decorated with neo-classical motifs; drawers flanked by 2 doors; molded top shelf supported by backsplash and 2 slender columns.
Plan view: serpentine top and suggested upper shelf.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Sideboard with Serpentine Front in Elevation and Partial Plan, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-51
